title: Spell Caster
description: An alternative cover edition for this ASIN can be found here.Can magic and science come together to catch a murderer?   Cassie's world is turned upside down when she's given an unusual blood sample to test. And when a mysterious man shows up at her lab telling her he has the answers she's looking for, she's pulled into a world of murder, investigations, and intrigue.   Finally able to explore the connection between her powers as a witch and her expertise as a scientist to uncover why paranormals keep turning up dead. -  Spell Caster is a reverse harem paranormal mystery set in the Paranormal Council Universe.
author: Laura Greenwood
